TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistrySecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public NotInheritable Class RegistrySecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性。

span.span: Represents the Windows access control security for a registry key.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象指定对注册表项的访问权限，还指定如何审核访问尝试。A object specifies access rights for a registry key, and also specifies how access attempts are audited. 注册表项的访问权限表示为规则，每个访问规则都由一个对象表示 。Access rights to the registry key are expressed as rules, with each access rule represented by a object. 每个审核规则都由一个 对象表示。Each auditing rule is represented by a object. 这会镜像底层的 Windows 安全系统，其中每个安全对象最多具有一个随机访问控制列表 (DACL) 控制对受保护对象的访问，最多一个系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 指定审核哪些访问尝试。This mirrors the underlying Windows security system, in which each securable object has at most one discretionary access control list (DACL) that controls access to the secured object, and at most one system access control list (SACL) that specifies which access attempts are audited. DACL 和 SACL 是 (ACE) 的访问控制项的排序列表，用于指定用户和组的访问权限和审核。The DACL and SACL are ordered lists of access control entries (ACE) that specify access and auditing for users and groups. 或 对象可能表示多个 ACE。A or object might represent more than one ACE. > [!NOTE] > Windows 访问控制安全性只能应用于注册表项。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它不能应用于存储在键中的各个键/值对。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. 、 和 类隐藏 acl 和 ace 的实现细节。The , , and classes hide the implementation details of ACLs and ACEs. 它们允许你忽略17个不同的 ACE 类型以及正确保留访问权限的继承和传播的复杂性。They allow you to ignore the seventeen different ACE types and the complexity of correctly maintaining inheritance and propagation of access rights. 这些对象还旨在防止出现以下常见的访问控制错误：These objects are also designed to prevent the following common access control errors: - 使用 null DACL 创建安全说明符。Creating a security descriptor with a null DACL. 对 DACL 的空引用允许任何用户向对象添加访问规则，这可能会造成拒绝服务攻击。A null reference to a DACL allows any user to add access rules to an object, potentially creating a denial-of-service attack. 新 对象始终以空的 DACL 开头，这会拒绝所有用户的所有访问。A new object always starts with an empty DACL, which denies all access for all users. - 违反了 Ace 的规范排序。Violating the canonical ordering of ACEs. 如果 DACL 中的 ACE 列表不是以规范顺序保存的，则可能会无意中向用户授予对受保护对象的访问权限。If the ACE list in the DACL is not kept in the canonical order, users might inadvertently be given access to the secured object. 例如，拒绝的访问权限必须始终出现在允许的访问权限之前。For example, denied access rights must always appear before allowed access rights. 对象在内部保持正确的顺序。 objects maintain the correct order internally. - 操作安全描述符标志，这些标志应仅限 resource manager 控件。Manipulating security descriptor flags, which should be under resource manager control only. - 创建 ACE 标志的无效组合。Creating invalid combinations of ACE flags. - 操作继承的 Ace。Manipulating inherited ACEs. 继承和传播由资源管理器处理，以响应对访问和审核规则所做的更改。Inheritance and propagation are handled by the resource manager, in response to changes you make to access and audit rules. - 向 Acl 中插入无意义的 Ace。Inserting meaningless ACEs into ACLs. .NET 安全对象不支持的唯一功能是应由大多数应用程序开发人员避免的危险活动，如下所示：The only capabilities not supported by the .NET security objects are dangerous activities that should be avoided by the majority of application developers, such as the following: - 通常由资源管理器执行的低级别任务。Low-level tasks that are normally performed by the resource manager. - 以不维护规范排序的方式添加或移除访问控制项。Adding or removing access control entries in ways that do not maintain the canonical ordering. 若要修改注册表项的 Windows 访问控制安全性，请使用 方法来获取 对象。To modify Windows access control security for a registry key, use the method to get the object. 通过添加和删除规则修改安全对象，然后使用 方法将其重新附加。Modify the security object by adding and removing rules, and then use the method to reattach it. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对对象所做 的更改不会影响注册表项的访问级别，直到调用方法将已 更改的安全对象分配给注册表项。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 若要将访问控制安全性从一个注册表项复制到另一个注册表项，请使用 方法获取 表示第一个注册表项的访问和审核规则的对象，然后使用 方法将这些规则分配给第二个注册表项。To copy access control security from one registry key to another, use the method to get a object representing the access and audit rules for the first registry key, and then use the method to assign those rules to the second registry key. 你还可以使用具有 对象参数的或方法将规则分配给第二个注册表项 。You can also assign the rules to a second registry key with an or method that takes a object parameter. 投资于安全描述符定义语言 (SDDL) 的用户可以使用 方法来设置注册表项的访问规则，并使用 方法来获取表示采用 SDDL 格式的访问规则的字符串。Users with an investment in the security descriptor definition language (SDDL) can use the method to set access rules for a registry key, and the method to obtain a string that represents the access rules in SDDL format. 这不建议用于新的开发。This is not recommended for new development. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何在添加和删除兼容规则后进行合并，第二个示例演示继承和传播标志如何影响规则的添加和删除。The first example shows how compatible rules merge when added and removed, and the second shows how inheritance and propagation flags affect the addition and deletion of rules. 示例 1Example 1 下面的代码示例演示如何 从兼容规则中删除权限，以及该方法如何将 权限与兼容的规则合并。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 该示例创建一个 对象并添加允许当前用户权限的规则 。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 然后，该示例创建一个规则，该规则 向用户授予与第一条规则相同的继承和传播权限，并使用 方法从对象中删除此新规则 。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的组成部分 ，因此它将从兼容规则中删除。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 将显示对象中的规则 ，并显示的其余组成部分 。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 然后，示例代码调用 方法，将权限合并 回对象中的规则 。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 本部分中的第二个示例附加一个安全对象，并在和中执行示例 。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)] 示例 2Example 2 下面的代码示例演示使用继承和传播的访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 该示例创建一个 对象，然后创建并添加两个具有标志的规则 。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一个规则没有传播标志，而第二条具有 和 。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序将在对象中显示规则 ，然后使用 对象创建子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建一个子子项和一个孙级子项，并显示每个子项的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, then displays the security for each subkey. 最后，程序删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新 对象始终以空的自由访问列表开头 (DACL) ，这将拒绝所有用户的所有访问。A new object always starts with an empty discretionary access list (DACL), which denies all access for all users.

public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示访问权限的枚举类型。

span.span: Gets the enumeration type that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 枚举。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类的类将 重写 属性，并返回它们用来表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时，请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

summary.span: 使用指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志为指定用户创建新的访问控制规则。

span.span: Creates a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示指定用户的指定权限。

span.span: A object representing the specified rights for the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建访问控制规则的建议方法是使用类的构造函数 。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以指定 标志，但没有任何一点要这样做。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 出于访问控制的目的，子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 对名称/值对的访问权限由子项的权限控制。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项都是容器 (也就是说，它们可以包含其他子项) ，它们不受标志的影响 。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定 标志不必要地使规则维护复杂化，因为这会影响兼容规则的正常组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 指定了一个无效值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类的类将 重写 属性，并返回用于表示访问规则的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时，请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确访问规则类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的访问控制规则。

span.span: The access control rule to add.

summary.span: 搜索匹配的访问控制，新规则将与之进行合并。

span.span: Searches for a matching access control with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果未找到符合条件的规则，则添加新规则。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索具有相同用户或组以及与相同的规则 `rule` 。The method searches for rules with the same user or group and the same as `rule`. 如果未找到， `rule` 则添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则，则中的权限 `rule` 将与现有规则合并。If a matching rule is found, the rights in `rule` are merged with the existing rule. 如果规则具有不同的继承标志，则无法合并规则。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 例如，如果允许用户使用没有继承标志的 "读取" 访问权限，并且 用于添加一个规则，为用户提供对 () 子项的继承写入访问权限 ，则这两个规则将无法合并。For example, if a user is allowed read access with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule giving the user write access with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged. 不会合并具有不同值的规则 。Rules with different values are never merged. 规则以最经济的方式表示权限。Rules express rights in the most economical way. 例如，如果用户具有 和 权限，并且你添加了允许权限的规则 ，则该用户将拥有权限的所有组成部分 。For example, if a user has , and rights, and you add a rule allowing rights, the user has all the constituent parts of rights. 如果查询用户的权限，将看到包含权限的规则 。If you query the user's rights, you will see a rule containing rights. 同样，如果您删除 权限，其他权利的其他组成部分 将再次出现。Similarly, if you remove rights, the other constituents of rights will reappear. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建了注册表访问规则并将其添加到了一个 对象中，其中显示了允许和拒绝权限的规则如何保持独立，同时合并了相同类型的兼容规则。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 可在和中找到附加安全对象的 示例 。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . 演示继承和传播标志的代码示例可在类中找到 。A code example that demonstrates inheritance and propagation flags can be found in the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的审核规则。

span.span: The audit rule to add.

param.span: 由此规则指定的用户来确定搜索。

span.span: The user specified by this rule determines the search.

summary.span: 搜索可以将新规则与之合并的审核规则。

span.span: Searches for an audit rule with which the new rule can be merged.

summary.span: 如果未找到符合条件的规则，则添加新规则。

span.span: If none are found, adds the new rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索与相同用户或组的规则 `rule` 。The method searches for rules with the same user or group as `rule`. 如果未找到， `rule` 则添加。If none are found, `rule` is added. 如果找到匹配规则，则中的标志 `rule` 将合并到现有规则。If a matching rule is found, the flags in `rule` are merged into the existing rule. 如果规则具有不同的继承标志，则无法合并规则。Rules cannot be merged if they have different inheritance flags. 例如，如果对特定用户（没有继承标志）审核尝试写入密钥失败，并 使用来添加一个规则，该规则指定对同一用户审核失败的更改权限尝试，但对于子项 () 的继承 ，则这两个规则不能合并。For example, if failed attempts to write to a key are audited for a particular user, with no inheritance flags, and is used to add a rule specifying that failed attempts to change permissions are to be audited for the same user, but with inheritance for subkeys (), the two rules cannot be merged.

summary.span: 新建审核规则，指定此规则应用到的用户、要审核的访问权限、规则的继承和传播以及触发此规则的结果。

span.span: Creates a new audit rule, specifying the user the rule applies to, the access rights to audit, the inheritance and propagation of the rule, and the outcome that triggers the rule.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示指定用户的指定审核规则，带有指定标志。

returns.span: 该方法的返回类型是基类 ，但可以安全地将返回值强制转换为派生类。

span.span: The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建审核规则的建议方法是使用类的构造函数 。The recommended way to create audit rules is to use the constructors of the class. > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以指定 标志，但没有任何一点要这样做。Although you can specify the flag, there is no point in doing so. 出于审核控制的目的，子项中的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of audit control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 对名称/值对的审核权限由子项的权限控制。The audit rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项都是容器 (也就是说，它们可以包含其他子项) ，它们不受标志的影响 。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定 标志不必要地使规则维护复杂化，因为这会影响兼容规则的正常组合。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the normal combination of compatible rules.

exception.span: 、、 或 指定了一个无效值。

span.span: , , , or specifies an invalid value.
is .
-or-
is zero.

exception.span: 既不属于类型 ，也不属于可以转换为 类型的类型（如 ）。

span.span: is neither of type , nor of a type such as that can be converted to type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AuditRuleType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AuditRuleType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示审核规则的类型。

span.span: Gets the type that the class uses to represent audit rules.

value.span: 一个表示 类的 对象。

span.span: A object representing the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类的类将 重写 属性，并返回用于表示审核权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent audit rights. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时，请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确审核规则类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct audit rule type to use with each security object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As RegistryAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 指定要搜索的用户和 的 ，以及匹配规则（如果找到）必须兼容的一组继承和传播标志。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for, and a set of inheritance and propagation flags that a matching rule, if found, must be compatible with.

param.span: 指定要从兼容规则移除的权限（如果找到）。

span.span: Specifies the rights to remove from the compatible rule, if found.

summary.span: 搜索如下的访问控制规则：与指定的访问规则具有相同的用户和 （允许或拒绝），并具有兼容的继承和传播标志；如果找到，则从中移除指定访问规则中包含的权限。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified access rule, and with compatible inheritance and propagation flags; if such a rule is found, the rights contained in the specified access rule are removed from it.

returns.span: 如果找到一个兼容规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a compatible rule is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将搜索当前的 规则，该规则具有相同的用户和与相同的 值 `rule` 。The current is searched for a rule that has the same user and the same value as `rule`. 如果未找到此类规则，则不执行任何操作，并且该方法将返回 `false` 。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到匹配规则，则检查其继承和兼容性标志是否与中指定的标志兼容 `rule` 。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果未找到兼容的规则，则不执行任何操作，并且该方法将返回 `false` 。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有兼容标志的规则，则中指定的权限 `rule` 将从兼容规则中删除，并且该方法将返回 `true` 。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果 `rule` 指定的权限不包含在兼容规则中，则不会对这些权限采取任何措施。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果从兼容规则中删除所有权限，则将从当前对象中删除整个规则 。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从兼容规则中删除权限，以及该方法如何将 权限与兼容的规则合并。The following code example shows how the method removes rights from a compatible rule, and how the method merges rights with compatible rules. 该示例创建一个 对象并添加允许当前用户权限的规则 。The example creates a object and adds a rule that allows the current user rights. 然后，该示例创建一个规则，该规则 向用户授予与第一条规则相同的继承和传播权限，并使用 方法从对象中删除此新规则 。The example then creates a rule that grants the user , with the same inheritance and propagation rights as the first rule, and uses the method to remove this new rule from the object. 是的组成部分 ，因此它将从兼容规则中删除。 is a constituent of , so it is removed from the compatible rule. 将显示对象中的规则 ，并显示的其余组成部分 。The rules in the object are displayed, showing the remaining constituents of . 然后，示例代码调用 方法，将权限合并 回对象中的规则 。The example code then calls the method to merge the right back into the rule in the object. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 本部分中的第二个示例附加一个安全对象，并在中执行示例 。The second example in this section attaches a security object, and so do the examples in . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 ，指定要搜索的用户和 。

span.span: A that specifies the user and to search for.

param.span: 忽略此规则指定的任何权限、继承标志或传播标志。

span.span: Any rights, inheritance flags, or propagation flags specified by this rule are ignored.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则具有相同用户和 （允许或拒绝）的所有访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for all access control rules with the same user and (allow or deny) as the specified rule and, if found, removes them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前 将搜索具有相同用户和值的规则 `rule` 。The current is searched for rules that have the same user and the same value as `rule`. `rule`执行此搜索时，将忽略指定的任何权限、继承标志或传播标志。Any rights, inheritance flags, or propagation flags specified by `rule` are ignored when performing this search. 如果未找到匹配规则，则不执行任何操作。If no matching rules are found, no action is taken. 例如，如果用户具有多个规则，这些规则允许各种权限具有不同的继承和传播标志，则可以通过创建一个对象来删除所有这些规则，这些规则 使用任意权限和标志来指定用户和，并将该规则传递给 方法。For example, if a user has multiple rules that allow various rights with different inheritance and propagation flags, you can remove all those rules by creating a object that specifies the user and , with any arbitrary rights and flags, and passing that rule to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法将 删除所有匹配用户和 的规则，同时忽略权限和标志。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match user and , ignoring rights and flags. 该示例创建一个 对象，并使用不同的继承和传播标志，为当前用户添加允许和拒绝各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 然后，该示例创建一个新规则，该规则允许当前用户获取所有权，并将此规则传递给 方法以删除允许访问的两个规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user to take ownership, and passes that rule to the method to remove the two rules that allow access. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参见 方法和 方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleAll/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAccessRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要移除的 。

span.span: The to remove.

summary.span: 搜索与指定的规则完全匹配的访问控制规则，如果找到则将其移除。

span.span: Searches for an access control rule that exactly matches the specified rule and, if found, removes it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 `rule` 在所有详细信息（包括标志）中完全匹配时，才会删除规则。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 具有相同用户和的其他规则 不受影响。Other rules with the same user and are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 规则表示 (ACE) 的一个或多个基础访问控制项，当你修改用户的访问安全规则时，将根据需要拆分或合并这些项。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the access security rules for a user. 因此，在添加规则时，该规则可能不再存在于其所在的特定窗体中，在这种情况下，该 方法将无法删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 方法仅当规则完全匹配时才删除规则。The following code example shows that the method removes a rule only if it matches exactly. 该示例创建两个允许不同权限的规则。The example creates two rules that allow different rights. 规则具有兼容的继承和传播标志，因此，在添加第二个规则时，它将与第一个规则合并。The rules have compatible inheritance and propagation flags, so when the second rule is added it merges with the first. 该示例调用 方法，并指定第一条规则，但由于规则已合并，因此没有匹配的规则。The example calls the method, specifying the first rule, but because the rules are merged there is no rule that matches. 然后，该示例调用 方法以从合并规则中删除第二个规则，最后调用 方法以删除第一个规则。The example then calls the method to the remove the second rule from the merged rule, and finally calls the method to remove the first rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参见 方法和 方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.RemoveAccessRuleSpecific/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索当前的， 其中包含与相同的用户的审核规则 `rule` 。The current is searched for an audit rule that has the same user as `rule`. 如果未找到此类规则，则不执行任何操作，并且该方法将返回 `false` 。If no such rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到匹配规则，则检查其继承和兼容性标志是否与中指定的标志兼容 `rule` 。If matching rules are found, their inheritance and compatibility flags are checked for compatibility with the flags specified in `rule`. 如果未找到兼容的规则，则不执行任何操作，并且该方法将返回 `false` 。If no compatible rule is found, no action is taken, and the method returns `false`. 如果找到具有兼容标志的规则，则中指定的权限 `rule` 将从兼容规则中删除，并且该方法将返回 `true` 。If a rule with compatible flags is found, the rights specified in `rule` are removed from the compatible rule, and the method returns `true`. 如果 `rule` 指定的权限不包含在兼容规则中，则不会对这些权限采取任何措施。If `rule` specifies rights not contained in the compatible rule, no action is taken with respect to those rights. 如果从兼容规则中删除所有权限，则将从当前对象中删除整个规则 。If all rights are removed from the compatible rule, the entire rule is removed from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 `rule` 在所有详细信息（包括标志）中完全匹配时，才会删除规则。The rule is removed only if it exactly matches `rule` in all details, including flags. 同一用户的其他审核规则不受影响。Other audit rules for the same user are not affected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 规则表示 (ACE) 的一个或多个基础访问控制项，当修改用户的审核安全规则时，将根据需要拆分或合并这些项。A rule represents one or more underlying access control entries (ACE), and these entries are split or combined as necessary when you modify the audit security rules for a user. 因此，在添加规则时，该规则可能不再存在于其所在的特定窗体中，在这种情况下，该 方法将无法删除它。Thus, a rule might no longer exist in the specific form it had when it was added, and in that case the method cannot remove it.

span.span: Removes all access control rules with the same user as the specified rule, regardless of , and then adds the specified rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有用户与指定规则匹配的访问规则， `rule` 则会添加。If there are no access rules whose user matches the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 匹配用户的所有规则替换为为匹配指定的规则。The following code example shows how the method replaces all rules for the matching user with the rule specified for the match. 该示例创建一个 对象，并使用不同的继承和传播标志，为当前用户添加允许和拒绝各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 然后，该示例创建一个新规则，该规则允许当前用户只读取密钥，并使用 方法删除用户的所有规则并将其替换为新规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the all rules for the user and replace them with the new rule. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参见 方法和 方法。See the method and the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.ResetAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的规则具有 ，则此方法的作用是移除 指定用户的所有规则，并将其替换为指定的规则。If the specified rule has , the effect of this method is to remove all rules for the specified user, replacing them with the specified rule. 如果指定的规则具有 ， 则指定用户的所有规则都将替换为指定的规则。If the specified rule has , all rules for the specified user are replaced with the specified rule. 如果没有规则的用户和 匹配指定的规则， `rule` 则添加。If there are no rules whose user and match the specified rule, `rule` is added. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示 方法删除与用户和 的规则，同时 `rule` 忽略权限和标志，并将其替换为 `rule` 。The following code example shows that the method removes all rules that match both the user and the of `rule`, ignoring rights and flags, and replaces them with `rule`. 该示例创建一个 对象，并使用不同的继承和传播标志，为当前用户添加允许和拒绝各种权限的规则。The example creates a object and adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, with different inheritance and propagation flags. 然后，该示例创建一个新规则，该规则允许当前用户只读取密钥，并使用 方法删除允许访问的两个规则，并将其替换为新规则。The example then creates a new rule that allows the current user only to read the key, and uses the method to remove the two rules that allow access and to replace them with the new rule. 拒绝访问的规则不受影响。The rule that denies access is not affected. > [!NOTE] > 此示例不会将安全对象附加到 对象。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 请参见 方法和 方法。See the method and the method.
